parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Future Participle Middle - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.
A kernel, grain, seed. Apparently a primary word; a kernel of seed.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Wheat, grain. Also plural irregular neuter sita of uncertain derivation; grain, especially wheat.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
